Plot: Based on the true story, two homicide detectives track Martha Beck and Raymond Martinez Fernandez, a murderous pair known as the "Lonely Hearts Killers" who lured their victims through the personals.
Title: Lonely Hearts
Actors: John Travolta, James Gandolfini, Jared Leto, Salma Hayek
tomatoConsensus: Several genres and plotlines intertwine in Lonely Hearts but don't connect, creating an uneven and unsatisfying film.
